name: Spirit Level
description:
This game was created for 2015 global game jam. It was my and the rest of this team's first game jam. We had a lot of fun.

Original Description: 

Richard is the ghost of an deceased elevator operator. He had been faithfully doing his job for 20 years. As his spirit floated over the slightly molding corpse, the ghost of the man sometimes known as Dick, asked himself, "What now?"

The answer, as usual: carry on!

As Richard, take possession of an elevator and perform well enough to keep the elevator servicemen at bay...

Global Game Jam Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/spirit-level

Team:

Programming: Nic Malan
Visual Design and Programming: Nick Cuthbert
Title screen: Chad Lawrence
Music:  The Elevator Bossa Nova, Ben Sound
